events.name: Music Festival 2024
events.description: Join us for an unforgettable musical experience with performances from top artists. This year features rock, classical, and electronic music genres.

events.name: Food Festival
events.description: Savor a variety of cuisines from across the world. Special food trucks, live cooking stations, and more!"

events.name: Sports Event 2025
events.description: Catch the excitement of national sports teams competing for the championship in multiple events.

events.name: Film Festival 2024
events.description: A celebration of international cinema with screenings, awards, and panels featuring filmmakers and critics.

events.name: Bathukamma Festival
events.description: Celebrate the vibrant and beautiful Bathukamma festival in the heart of Telangana. A floral festival dedicated to Goddess Gauri, filled with colorful flower stacks, traditional songs, and joyful dances.
